title: Feature: The Music From Skins (S6, E3)
content:
After the emotional trauma of last weeks episode, Skins was always bound to take a more light-hearted turn.

Introducing a new character (Alex) partway through a series can be a difficult one, but it worked pretty well, aside from the line ‘everything about me is magic’. Anyway, check out all the tracks from today’s episode below, and leave any comments in the section at the bottom.

Alex is introduced – Mike Simonetti – The Third Of The Storms (feat. Sam Sparro)

Oh dear, not Sam Sparro. Guess it was alright.

On the radio at breakfast – The Secret Sisters – The One I Love Is Gone

Slightly more folky than we’re used to from Skins, good choice though.

Alex and Liv go back to his house – Mariachi El Bronx – My Love

Again, keeping up with the folk theme, but another decent choice.

Alex reads his Grandpa’s diary – Bonnie Prince Billy – Is It The Sea?

Fantastic choice from one of the finest songwriters ever, not really used to it’s full extent.

Mimi dances in the pub – Segal – Headroll Federal Deal

Segal…. again.

Alex and Liv gamble – Segal – Punishing Cake

And again.

Alex gets intimate with Ryan – Segal – Big sky

Oh and again.

Alex and Liv clean the house – Nguzunguzu – Mirage

Alright, I’m getting bored of writing.

Alex runs home – Soft Moon – Tiny Spiders

Awesome choice.

Alex finds his Gran at rest – Jack Blanchard – Lonely Bell

Can’t find this anywhere, nice track though.

Alex takes the postcard – S. Carey – Broken

Slightly cheesey, but worked alright.

Liv flashes – Council Estate Supermodels – Keep Smiling

So alternative and funny, right? Um. Cool track.

Boat party – Death In Vegas – Your Loft My Acid – Fearless Transhouse Mix

Good song originally, but kinda boring remix.

Alex says goodbye to his Gran – Death In Vegas – Your Loft My Acid

Slightly bizarre using the original straight after a remix.

Alex and Liv in the water – Akron/Family – One Spring Morning

Warning, indeh track.

End credits – The Rapture – How Deep Is Your Love?

Best track of the episode.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
